19#include <string>
20
21namespace ZXing {
22
23class DecoderResult;
24class BitMatrix;
25
26namespace QRCode {
27
28
29/**
30* <p>The main class which implements QR Code decoding -- as opposed to locating and extracting
31* the QR Code from an image.</p>
32*
33* @author Sean Owen
34*/
35class Decoder
36{
37public:
38 /**
39 * <p>Convenience method that can decode a QR Code represented as a 2D array of booleans.
40 * "true" is taken to mean a black module.</p>
41 *
42 * @param image booleans representing white/black QR Code modules
43 * @param hints decoding hints that should be used to influence decoding
44 * @return text and bytes encoded within the QR Code
45 * @throws FormatException if the QR Code cannot be decoded
46 * @throws ChecksumException if error correction fails
47 */
48 //DecoderResult decode(boolean[][] image, Map<DecodeHintType, ? > hints);
49
50 /**
51 * <p>Decodes a QR Code represented as a {@link BitMatrix}. A 1 or "true" is taken to mean a black module.</p>
52 *
53 * @param bits booleans representing white/black QR Code modules
54 * @param hints decoding hints that should be used to influence decoding
55 * @return text and bytes encoded within the QR Code
56 * @throws FormatException if the QR Code cannot be decoded
57 * @throws ChecksumException if error correction fails
58 */
59 static DecoderResult Decode(const BitMatrix& bits, const std::string& hintedCharset);
60};
61
62} // QRCode
63} // ZXing
64
